articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as South Africa play Afghanistan in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: South Africa v Afghanistan - clips, radio & text

articles.description: Reaction to Thursday's European games, plus the latest from Friday's Premier League news conferences.
articles.title: European reaction: West Ham, Brighton, Villa & Rangers win; VAR drama for Liverpool

articles.description: Sir Jim Ratcliffe's deal to become a minority shareholder in Manchester United is expected to be agreed during this month's international break, possibly as early as next week.
articles.title: Ratcliffe close to Man Utd minority stake agreement

articles.description: Tottenham midfielder James Maddison withdraws from the England squad for November's Euro 2024 qualifiers with an ankle injury.
articles.title: Maddison withdraws from England squad with injury

articles.description: Jurgen Klopp is angered by Liverpool's performance in their Europa League defeat at Toulouse - and the noisy home fans drowning out his media conference.
articles.title: 'Chaotic' Liverpool anger Klopp in loss at Toulouse

articles.description: South Africa's David Miller makes a meal of a catch, including hitting himself in the face with the ball, before holding on to remove Afghanistan's Rahmat Shah for 26 in their Cricket World Cup.
articles.title: 'He smashed himself in the face!' Miller takes juggling catch

articles.description: Four-time Grand Slam champion Naomi Osaka will return to tennis six months after giving birth when she plays at the Brisbane International in January.
articles.title: Osaka returning to tennis six months after giving birth

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Blossoms duo Tom Ogden and Joe Donovan, and Suggs from Madness, for this weekend's Premier League predictions.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v Blossoms & Suggs

articles.description: West Ham move a step closer to reaching the Europa League knockout stages with a narrow victory over Olympiakos at London Stadium.
articles.title: Hammers beat Olympiakos to edge closer to knockouts

articles.description: Watch as Jurgen Klopp is less than impressed with the noise at the post-match news conference in Toulouse after Liverpool lose 3-2 to the French side in the Europa League.
articles.title: 'Wow, who organised this?' - Klopp on news conference noise
